caption.title: Supplementary video S2
caption.p: Monitoring of NS1-treated differentiated microvascular endothelial cells by time-lapse microscopy. Microvascular endothelial TIME cells were grown in Matrigel for 16 h, after which cells had differentiated and formed tubular structures. Video S2 show that during treatment with 6 μg NS1/ml for an additional 9 h, the tubular structures were impaired.
